thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Gol Announces Preliminary Outlook And Investor Guidance For 2019

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gol Announces Preliminary Outlook And Investor Guidance For 2019
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes Sa :
* GOL ANNOUNCES PRELIMINARY OUTLOOK AND INVESTOR GUIDANCE FOR 2019
* SEES PRELIMINARY 2019 AVERAGE LOAD FACTOR 79% TO 81% * SEES 2019 PRELIMINARY TOTAL NET REVENUES ABOUT R$12 BILLION
* ‍ SEES PRELIMINARY 2019 EARNINGS PER ADS FULLY DILUTED $1.00 TO $1.50
* SEES PRELIMINARY 2019 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ABOUT R$600 MILLION
* SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ABOUT R$600 MILLION * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW BRL 11.29 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 ASKS, SYSTEM UP 1% TO 3% * SEES PRELIMINARY 2019 NON-FUEL CASK ABOUT R$0.15
* SEES 2018 NON-FUEL CASK ABOUT R$0.15
* SEES 2018 EARNINGS PER ADS $0.75 TO $0.90 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
